SELECT A.EXAM_SN, A.EXAM_NUMBER, A.EXAM_TITLE, A.EXAM_ANSWER, A.EXAM_TYPE, A.EXAM_CONTENT, A.EXAM_INFO_CD FROM EXAM A, EXAM_INFO B WHERE A.EXAM_INFO_CD = B.EXAM_INFO_CD AND A.EXAM_INFO_CD = #{examInfoCd}
AND EXAM_TITLE LIKE concat('%',concat(#{search},'%'))
AND EXAM_ANSWER LIKE concat('%',concat(#{search},'%'))
ORDER BY EXAM_NUMBER ASC
